name: Platformer (Guambo)
description:
Keyboard Controls:

Jump: 'J'

Walk: 'A/D'

Fast  Fall: Hold 'S'

Dash: 'K'

-------------------------

Gamepad Controls:

Jump: 'A'

Walk: Horizontal input on 'Left Analog Stick'

Fast Fall: Hold 'Down' on 'Left Analog Stick'

Dash: 'RT'

-------------------------

Borrowed the Sunnyland Fox art asset here: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349

All other art assets were made using Aseprite.

Movement inspired by Hallow Knight and Celeste.

Collision detection and resolution based on Sebastion Lague 2D Platformer series:
